text: Yoshiki Okamura (born 21 March 1977) is a former Japanese football player. == Playing career == Okamura was born in Nagasaki Prefecture on March 21, 1977. He graduated from Kansai University. He joined J1 League club Gamba Osaka in 1999. On May 24, 2000, he started as a midfielder against Consadole Sapporo in J.League Cup.J.League However he did not play much until 2001. In 2002, he moved to Sagawa Express Osaka, who were recently promoted to Japan Football League. He played many matches over the next three seasons. He retired at the end of the 2004 season. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 1999 Gamba Osaka J1 League 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2000 0 0 1 0 1 0 2 0 2001 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2002 Sagawa Express Osaka Football League 16 3 - 16 3 2003 28 7 - 28 7 2004 15 2 - 15 2 Total Total Total 59 12 1 0 1 0 61 12 == References == Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Yamaguchi Prefecture
